title: What are some songs in the key of F minor? - Quora

response.answer_text: What are some songs in the key of f minor? I’ll do a blend of songs and classical pieces: Aerosmith - “Dream On” (already mentioned, but too good not to be mentioned again) Tchaikovsky - Symphony No. 4 (ditto) Dream Theater - “The Root of All Evil” and “Octavarium” Led Zeppelin - “When the Levee Breaks” (kind of a modally ambivalent blend of Major/minor) Can’t think of much else right now, f minor’s not a very common main key of many musical works, although it can be used in passing and in certain parts of a piece quite often. Just thought of another: Dream Theater - “In the Name of God”

One- Three Dog Night What Do I Have To Do- Stabbing Westward When the Levee Breaks- Led Zeppelin Zero the Hero - Black Sabbath Spooky Little Girl- The Zombies Wildchild- W.A.S.P. Stayin' Alive- Bee Gees For You- Staind Waste- Staind Lakini’s Juice- Live Edit: Here are a few more additions: Paint it Black- Rolling Stones For Whom the Bell Tolls- Metallica For You- Staind Tears are Falling- Kiss I Can't Go for That (No Can Do)- Hall and Oates Fire- The Crazy World of Arthur Brown
